props.name: template_id
props.description: Select your template. (If you want to use Template ID. Click on the "(x)" above this field. Template ID can be found by opening a template and going to “Render”. Being there copy the template ID from the top right.)

props.name: format
props.description: The format of the image to generate.

props.name: fields
props.description: The values to apply to the fields in the template.

props.name: modifications
props.description: The extra modifications to apply to the image. See "Detailed dynamic modifications" in https://robolly.com/docs/api-reference/
